filmography.title: The Smiling Lieutenant
filmography.role_description: A vivacious violin player in a Viennese beer garden who falls in love with a lieutenant but ultimately helps his royal wife win his heart.
filmography.plot: A lieutenant in the Austrian army is forced to marry a princess, but he loves a violin player in an all-girl band.

filmography.title: The Sign of the Cross
filmography.role_description: The seductive and ruthless wife of Emperor Nero, famous for her milk bath scene and her manipulation of Rome's politics.
filmography.plot: A Roman soldier falls in love with a Christian woman during the reign of Nero, testing his loyalty to the Empire.

filmography.title: Torch Singer
filmography.role_description: A woman who gives up her illegitimate child and becomes a notorious nightclub singer, only to search for her daughter years later.
filmography.plot: An unwed mother gives up her baby, becomes a torch singer, and eventually tries to find her child.

filmography.title: It Happened One Night
filmography.role_description: A spoiled runaway heiress who learns about life and love from a cynical newspaper reporter during a cross-country bus trip.
filmography.plot: A renegade reporter trails a runaway heiress for a big story, but the two of them begin to fall in love.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; Oscar: Win – Best Picture

filmography.title: Cleopatra
filmography.role_description: The seductive Queen of Egypt who uses her charm and wit to manipulate Julius Caesar and Marc Antony to save her kingdom.
filmography.plot: The Queen of Egypt seduces Julius Caesar and Marc Antony in an attempt to protect her empire from Rome.

filmography.title: Imitation of Life
filmography.role_description: A struggling widow who builds a pancake empire with her black housekeeper, dealing with business success and maternal heartbreak.
filmography.plot: A widow and her housekeeper go into business together and face difficulties with their daughters as they grow up.

filmography.title: The Gilded Lily
filmography.role_description: A stenographer who becomes a celebrity sensation ('The No Girl') after turning down a British aristocrat.
filmography.plot: A reporter helps a stenographer become famous to spite a snobbish aristocrat, but realizes he loves her himself.

filmography.title: Private Worlds
filmography.role_description: A dedicated psychiatrist at a mental hospital who faces sexism from a new conservative superintendent.
filmography.plot: The staff of a mental hospital deal with their own personal demons while treating patients.

filmography.title: Under Two Flags
filmography.role_description: A fiery French cafe girl in Algeria who falls in love with a British legionnaire and sacrifices herself for him.
filmography.plot: A British aristocrat joins the French Foreign Legion to escape his past and becomes involved with a cafe singer.

filmography.title: I Met Him in Paris
filmography.role_description: An American fashion designer in Paris who is courted by two friends, a playwright and a novelist, during a winter vacation.
filmography.plot: A woman trying to have a fling in Paris ends up in a love triangle on a Swiss ski slope.

filmography.title: Tovarich
filmography.role_description: A Russian Grand Duchess who, along with her husband, poses as a servant in a Parisian household to hide their royal identity.
filmography.plot: Destitute Russian royals living in Paris take jobs as servants for a wealthy banker.

filmography.title: Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a ruined aristocrat who marries a wealthy American multi-divorcé and teaches him a lesson in love.
filmography.plot: A wealthy man marries his eighth wife, who is determined to make him pay for his past treatment of women.

filmography.title: Zaza
filmography.role_description: A French music hall star who falls in love with a married man, leading to heartbreak and scandal.
filmography.plot: A music hall performer has an affair with a married man, not knowing he has a family.

filmography.title: Midnight
filmography.role_description: A penniless American showgirl in Paris who masquerades as a Hungarian baroness to crash high society.
filmography.plot: A chorus girl stranded in Paris is hired by a jealous husband to break up his wife's affair with a gigolo.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: It's a Wonderful World
filmography.role_description: A poetess who gets kidnapped by a fugitive detective and eventually helps him solve a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: A private detective convicted of a crime he didn't commit escapes prison and kidnaps a poetess to help him find the real killer.

filmography.title: Drums Along the Mohawk
filmography.role_description: A city girl who marries a frontiersman and must adapt to the harsh life of the Mohawk Valley during the Revolutionary War.
filmography.plot: Newlyweds try to establish a farm in the Mohawk Valley but face the menace of Indians and Tories as the Revolutionary War begins.

filmography.title: Boom Town
filmography.role_description: The loyal wife caught in a love triangle between two warring oil tycoons and best friends.
filmography.plot: Two friends strike oil in Texas, but their partnership is threatened by their rivalry over a woman and business success.

filmography.title: Arise, My Love
filmography.role_description: An American reporter in Paris who saves a pilot from execution in Spain and covers the start of WWII.
filmography.plot: A female reporter saves an American flyer from a Spanish firing squad, and they fall in love while covering the war in Europe.

filmography.title: The Palm Beach Story
filmography.role_description: A wife who decides to divorce her struggling husband and marry a millionaire to finance her husband's architectural dreams.
filmography.plot: A woman tries to divorce her husband to marry a rich man who can fund her husband's business ideas.

filmography.title: So Proudly We Hail!
filmography.role_description: The leader of a group of Army nurses serving in the Philippines during the harrowing events of WWII.
filmography.plot: The story of a group of Red Cross nurses in the Philippines during the early days of World War II.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress (Paulette Goddard)

filmography.title: No Time for Love
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated photographer who clashes with and falls for a rough-and-tumble sandhog digging a tunnel under the river.
filmography.plot: A female photographer is assigned to cover the digging of a tunnel and falls for one of the mud-covered workers.

filmography.title: Since You Went Away
filmography.role_description: A housewife who struggles to keep her family together and make ends meet while her husband is away fighting in WWII.
filmography.plot: With her husband away at war, a woman must manage their home and two daughters while dealing with rationing and loss.

filmography.title: Tomorrow Is Forever
filmography.role_description: A woman who remarries after her first husband is declared dead in WWI, only to have him return years later unrecognized.
filmography.plot: A man presumed dead in WWI returns home with a new face and identity to find his wife has remarried.

filmography.title: The Egg and I
filmography.role_description: A city woman who marries a poultry farmer and struggles with the rustic life in the Pacific Northwest.
filmography.plot: A newlywed couple buys a chicken farm, but the wife finds that farm life is not what she expected.
filmography.awards: Box Office Hit (Inspired Ma and Pa Kettle)

filmography.title: Sleep, My Love
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman whose husband uses drugs and psychological manipulation to drive her to suicide so he can steal her fortune.
filmography.plot: A woman wakes up on a train with no memory of how she got there, unaware her husband is gaslighting her.

filmography.title: Three Came Home
filmography.role_description: The true story of an American author imprisoned in a Japanese POW camp in Borneo during WWII, fighting to keep her son alive.
filmography.plot: An American woman living in Borneo with her British husband is separated from him and held in a prison camp by the Japanese during WWII.

filmography.title: Parrish
filmography.role_description: A mother who marries a ruthless tobacco tycoon to secure a future for her son; Colbert's final feature film role.
filmography.plot: A young man clashes with his stepfather, a powerful tobacco grower, while trying to find his own way in the industry.
